original_text: Therefore he brought upon them the king of the Chaldees, who slew their young men with the sword in the house of their sanctuary, and had no compassion upon young man or maiden, old man, or him that stooped for age: he gave them all into his hand.
korean_text: 하나님이 갈대아 왕의 손에 그들을 다 넘기시매 그가 와서 그들의 성전에서 칼로 청년들을 죽이며 청년 남녀와 노인과 병약한 사람을 긍휼히 여기지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Therefore he brought upon them king of the Chaldees
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 그들에게 갈대아 왕을 가져왔다

sentences.original_text: who slew their young men with the sword
in the house of their sanctuary
and had no compassion upon young man or maiden
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 청년이나 소녀에게 자비를 베풀지 않았다

sentences.original_text: old man, or him that stooped for age
sentences.korean_translation: 노인이나 나이 때문에 허리가 굽은 자에게

sentences.original_text: he gave them all into his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 모두를 그의 손에 넘겨주었다
